runs.comm: tight line and length on middle stump, defended on the front foot towards midwicket
nudged off the front foot towards square leg for a single
a flatter, quick ball on middle and leg, Dhawan tries to turn the ball off his pads but misses
a shorter length and Dhawan goes back to pull but can't beat square leg

lbw! That looked like it was missing leg though. Dhawan played back to a fuller ball that was much quicker and skidded on to him, he tried to chop at the ball but was beaten and hit on the pad. The ball pitched outside leg stump too, poor decision.
tossed up fuller on off and middle, Kohli drives to mid-on and takes a single
in the blockhole first over, dug out to midwicket
Kohli moves forward and across to one that slants across him and steers to third man
a full toss swings into the right-hander, Rohit leans forward and across and flicks through midwicket
the slower ball around off stump, steered towards third man
a slower ball again, defended back to the bowler
Rohit pushes forward at a slower ball but adjusts well once he realises he is beaten by the change of pace, played the slower ball with soft hands and the outside edge falls well short of the keeper
a loose full toss, Kohli launches it off the front foot into the gap on the cow corner boundary
all the way this time, Badree drags the ball short, Kohli moves back in a flash and pulls over the cow corner boundary, just clears the rope
flatter and faster outside off, Kohli is beaten on the cut
draws Kohli forward with his length and spins the leg break past the outside edge of the forward push
nudged off the front foot through midwicket
driven to long on for a single
full and straight, Rohit stays in his crease and defends on the off side
a slower ball on middle and off, Rohit pushes forward and places it with soft hands towards cover
nudged off the pads through square leg, the line was a bit too straight from Santokie
pitches outside leg, easy pickings for Kohli, who stays in his crease and turns it of his pads wide of the fielder at short line leg
another shocker, especially with fine leg in the circle, full and on the pads from over the wicket, Kohli flicks and collects an easy boundary wide of short fine leg
a slower ball on off and middle, defended on the off side
tight line on middle stump, played off the back foot to square leg
Rohit steps out a long way and gets hit on the pad
shot! A languid stroke from Rohit, getting under the full ball and lofting inside out, with the turn over extra cover
too short this time, Rohit goes back and cuts hard, finding the gap at point for another boundary
nudged off the front foot towards long on
a full ball on leg stump, Kohli leans forward and nudges through midwicket
Narine over-steps while bowling a big off break, nudged behind square for a single ... free-hit coming up

a loose full toss outside off stump, Rohit simply stands his ground and smashes it over the long off boundary. Christmas came early for Rohit with that free hit, couldn't have asked for an easier delivery
punched to long on for a single
nudged off the pads through square for one more
Rohit stays back and nudges the ball towards point
Narine gets one to skid through low around off stump, Rohit manages to keep it out and play it on the off side
played off the back foot to point
starts with a friendly full toss on the pads, Kohli puts it away by moving forward and flicking fluently into the gap on the midwicket boundary
dabbed off the back foot behind point for one more
short of a length outside off, Rohit uses the width on offer to cut towards third man ... and West Indies continue to fall apart. Santokie over-runs the ball and allows a boundary
worked off the pads towards midwicket
a full ball outside off stump, Kohli moves forward and across to drive the ball towards long-on
Rohit moves forward and across this time to drive a straight, length ball towards wide long-on
Rohit gets beaten on the cut outside off
that's the doosra, Rohit reads it off the pitch and pulls his bat inside the line to let it pass outside off
the offbreak this time, Rohit stays back and nudges off his pads towards square leg
worked off the pads through square for another single
driven off the front foot towards long off
Kohli moves back and across to glance the ball off his pads behind square
pulled to deep midwicket for one more
Kohli flicks the ball once again through square leg, milking the single
defended on the front foot on the off side
a length ball, wicket to wicket line, pushed towards midwicket from the crease
punched off the back foot towards deep cover, runs coming really easily
fine leg is in the circle, so Rohit moves across his stumps to a length ball, gets inside the line, and scoops it over the fielder for a one-bounce four to fine leg
bowled so slowly outside off stump, Kohli waits in his crease and opens the face late to dab the ball towards third man
nudged off the pads in front of square for a single
punched back to the bowler, Samuels moves to his right and fields
driven off the back foot to cover
played back to the bowler from the crease
bowled slowly from round the wicket on a wicket to wicket line, Rohit defends
a flat long hop outside off, Kohli hits the ball along the ground through extra cover but can't find the gap on the boundary
driven from the crease towards long off for a single
defended back to the bowler
dragged short, Kohli goes back and pulls the ball towards long on
played back to the bowler
steps out of his crease to reach the pitch of the ball and drives to long on
short ball, Rohit goes back and pulls, Narine runs across the deep midwicket boundary and kicks it in with his boot
nudged with soft hands in front of point for a single
flicked off the pads in front of square for a single
Kohli moves forward and dabs the ball towards mid-on, the fielder from midwicket runs in quickly but mis-fields to allow the single
defended on the front foot
that's a rubbish long-hop, Rohit just winds up and pulls, sending the ball soaring over deep midwicket, Samuels doesn't seem the same bowler without his quicker ball
a full ball outside off, Kohli plays a cracking square drive off the front foot, sending the ball racing to the point boundary
driven down the ground to long off for a single
pitches leg and middle, Kohli clips it off his pads in front of square leg
a full ball on the pads, Kohli drives through midwicket to bring up his half-century
a full ball around off stump, driven on the front foot towards long off
driven to long off once again
Narine pitches the offbreak on middle and spins it down leg, Ramdin appeals to try and throw off the umpire, but he calls it wide
gets on to the front foot by moving across towards the off side and drives to long on
pushed off the front foot towards point
a quicker ball on off stump, Rohit punches from the crease to cover
Rohit also gets to 50 by moving across his crease and paddle scooping towards fine leg, he and Kohli have made light work of this chase
played with an open face towards backward point
moves back and across in his crease and nudges towards square leg
a full ball on off stump, Kohli strides forward and drives through extra cover
a very low full toss, Rohit leans across and flicks in front of square leg
that's a bit wide outside off stump, the batsman lets it go

Kohli's been bowled and he does not like it! He was aiming for the big shot across the line, the ball pitched outside off and he got an inside edge back on to his stumps. Swings his bat in disappointment.
short of a length wide outside off stump, Yuvraj swishes at it and is beaten
pulled away! A length ball and Yuvraj pounces, flaying the ball along the ground through midwicket with a powerful pull
worked off the pads through square leg
Yuvraj gets squared up by a ripping offbreak that pitches leg and passes the outside edge
punched off the back foot towards cover
Yuvraj defends on the front foot
pitches outside leg stump, Yuvraj gets forward and defends with bat close to pad
played off the front foot towards point for a single
Yuvrak thought he had flicked that square but the ball had hit his pad and dropped on the pitch, he had to scamper back because Russell was rushing to the ball
pulled firmly but it does not get past Gayle at midwicket
Yuvraj is caught in the crease by a length ball and he dabs towards point
Yuvraj tries to flick a good length ball that looks pretty straight and misses, he is hit on the pad. No appeal from West Indies. He may have got an inside edge
a full ball, Yuvraj drives towards long on for a single
a full toss down leg side, Rohit fails to connect with his swing
too full on middle, Rohit moves forward and drives the ball fluently through midwicket and into the gap on the boundary
dabbed with soft hands close on the off side - in front of point - and they run a single
nudged off the pads in front of square for another single
Rohit gets on to the front foot and works the ball behind square
Yuvraj waits on the back foot and cuts the ball through point
comes forward and plays the ball to midwicket
worked through midwicket for a single
Rohit backs away towards leg and opens the face to steer a length ball to short third man
a slower delivery and Rohit swats the ball through square leg for a single
Yuvraj dabs the ball in front of point and they sprint the single
Rohit swishes at a slower ball outside off and is beaten
Rohit chips the ball inside out over extra cover
length ball outside off, Yuvraj waits and open the face to play the ball towards point, he's levelled the scores and retained strike
played off the back foot towards backward point
wicket to wicket line, Yuvraj defends from his crease on the off side
caught at slip! Yuvraj goes and it's been a struggle for him once again. He tried to dab the ball towards third man as it spun away from him and edged it to his RCB team-mate Chris Gayle
and Raina shows how it's done ... goes back and cuts the ball hard between two fielders at point. The scoreline says only two balls to spare, but the margin of victory was much wider than that.
